name: Memphis_Camel_Double_Cushion_Futon_Sofa_Bed
reviews: Love the look and color of this couch. It is easy to change to a lay down position. But it is hard as a rock.
Product surprisingly easy to install. Very good ROI, strongly recommended.

WHile this serves the pupose on our lanai for now, it certainly isn't something you want to curl up on and read for a few hours. It is very easy to assemble - just screw on the legs - but two screws were the wrong size, so we had to scavange replacements. Just not very comfy and not likely to hold up for long with the very thin, pseudo-leather fabric.

This piece meets my expectations. It arrived in a really bulky box but it turned out he installation was attaching four legs, easy enough that everyone can do it. the size fits my space well and set to bed or sitting positions needs no effort at all. don't expect it to be a soft sofa but the firmness is just right as a bed. So far, our guesses have been using it on a regular basis and works out well.
description: Heighten the functionality of your furnishings with this luxuriously padded double cushion futon sofa bed. Easily accommodate overnight guests with its full reclining capabilities and treat them to a night of restful repose. The double cushion provides sumptuous comfort that may have you sleeping on your futon far more than your bed.Includes one luxuriously padded double cushion futon sofa bedBeautifully finished solid wood frame and chrome legs perfectly accent the sofa's camel tone upholsteryDurable premium PU leatherette materials resist wear and tearQuality crafted to provide both strength and support to accommodate the roughest sitters or sleepersA double cushion provides sumptuous comfortSofa measures 31.89"H x 69.69"W x 36.22"DBed dimensions are 16.93"H x 69.69"W x 43.31"DStyleContemporaryMaterialChrome, Faux Leather, Steel, WoodTypeSleeper Sofa, SofaFinishChrome, Steel, WoodAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolid
